titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish the Committee on the Elimination of Nonessential Federal Programs.
Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish the Committee on the Elimination of Nonessential Federal Programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: This resolution establishes the House Committee on the Elimination of Nonessential Federal Programs to analyze underperforming or nonessential federal programs and recommend actions to modify or eliminate those programs. The resolution also establishes expedited procedures for legislation reported by the committee to eliminate programs or rescind funding.
